dcterms:creator: A. Ahmadi
M. Halstead
C. McCool
dcterms:description: A dataset captured at a sugar beet field containing RGB-D images and robot wheel odometry, featuring crops and 8 different categories of weeds at various growth stages and herbicide treatment regimes.
dcterms:title: Arable Farming Sugar Beet (SB20)

dcterms:creator: C. Smitt
M. Halstead
T. Zaenker
M. Bennewitz
C. McCool
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of video sequences from a glasshouse environment with two sweet pepper cultivars, capturing RGB-D images, IMU data, and wheel odometry for binary-class segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Horticulture Glasshouse Sweet Pepper (BUP20)
